actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to freeze the inpatient hospital deductible which is imposed for purposes of hospital insurance benefits (and for purposes of determining the premiums payable by uninsured individuals not otherwise eligible), and the monthly premiums which are charged for purposes of supplementary medical insurance benefits, at their 1975 levels for an additional year.

summary.text: Revises title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to freeze the inpatient hospital deductible which is imposed for purposes of hospital insurance benefits (and for purposes of determining the premiums payable by uninsured individuals not otherwise eligible), and the monthly premiums which are charged for purposes of supplementary medical insurance benefits, at their 1975 levels for an additional year.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to freeze the inpatient hospital deductible which is imposed for purposes of hospital insurance benefits (and for purposes of determining the premiums payable by uninsured individuals not otherwise eligible), and the monthly premiums which are charged for purposes of supplementary medical insurance benefits, at their 1975 levels for an additional year.
